function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited information on how COVID-19 spreads in asymptomatic individuals","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and outbreak","Mitigation":"Research and study the transmission patterns in asymptomatic individuals","Technologies":"Advanced testing and surveillance tools","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Variation in reliable information on COVID-19 transmission between countries","Impact":"Inconsistent public health measures and responses","Mitigation":"Information sharing and collaboration between countries, standardization of protocols","Technologies":"Information sharing platforms, data analysis tools","People":"Government agencies, international health organizations","Owner":"Global health organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Shortage of COVID-19 testing kits and detection tools","Impact":"Difficulty in early identification and containment of the virus","Mitigation":"Manufacturing ramp-up, distribution and allocation optimizations","Technologies":"3D printing for rapid production, supply chain management systems","People":"Healthcare workers, public health agencies","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies"}]}
